content: Lifestyle Asked by AnonymousAsked on 15 Jan 2019Does anyone knows of a place with free mirror like in pasir ris or smth but not at scape that we can use for free like a venue for meeting.?Dance & practice as well as for meeting?2 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (2)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Junus EuTop Contributor (Sep)Level 8. WizardAnswered on 12 May 2019I find scape to be one of the places that have been set up for dancers (especially street styles) to practice for free. In fact, they have increased the mirrors there over time! As a dancer myself, that's one of my favourite places to practice. Otherwise, you could check out the polytechnics. They might chase out folks who are not students though!0 comments1

Leong Wen Fong, Community Lead at SeedlyLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 16 Jan 2019I don;t know about free, but you can check if any secondary school is willing to open up their studios after school hours or during weekends.I remember we rented a studio from my secondary school for about 5 bucks per person, and we only had 6 people. WE were there for about 2-3 hours.Then again, this happened some 10 years ago, so I can't be entirely sure of the numbers0 comments0
